document.full_text: mr. bevacqua helped start the eclectic clothing maker lrg, which targeted people eager to push their appearance beyond conventional hip-hop and skateboarding wear.
document.title: jonas bevacqua, co-founder of lrg clothing, dies at 34
lines_and_colors: mr. bevacqua helped start the eclectic clothing maker lrg, which targeted people eager to push their appearance beyond conventional hip-hop and skateboarding wear.
